attachments.title: Fixing a bug in Firefox. by andreubotella · Pull Request #1 · FiveTechSoft/snippets
attachments.text: Only the top bar shows up in Firefox, because of some weird interaction of the calc() function with the 100%. This change replaces it with the vh unit, which measures percentages of the window height.

attachments.title: Fix scroll by andreubotella · Pull Request #87 · FiveTechSoft/mod_harbour
attachments.text: This separates completely the outer page from the contents of the iframe, and has the iframe page scroll to bottom automatically as soon as it's (re)loaded.
